text: "Didn't We Almost Have It All" is a 1987 song by American singer Whitney Houston. It was taken from her second studio album Whitney. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 2 in Canada, number 4 in Ireland, number 12 in Spain, number 14 in the United Kingdom, number 16 in Belgium, number 17 in the Netherlands and number 20 in Germany. title: Didn't We Almost Have It All
